title: What is the best way to extend HDMI? - Quora

response.answer_text: Longer HDMI cables or extenders can be found with amplifier/repeaters to use inline with no additional power required - usually only necessary when you get over 30+ feet long. Be sure to get one that is compatible with the latest 4k HDMI standards, if you have recent equipment you’re connecting. Here’s an example, they’re not expensive: Monoprice Blackbird 4K Pro HDMI 2.0 Repeater 4K@60Hz YUV 4:4:4 - Monoprice.com
The best way is to buy a longer HDMI cable. If you need a very long distance, there’s an excellent technology called HDBaseT, which can extend HDMI up to 100 meters over Ethernet cable.
